commit.message:
ifcvt.c (total_bb_rtx_cost): New function.

        * ifcvt.c (total_bb_rtx_cost): New function.
        (find_if_case_1): Compare rtx_cost of basic block to cost of
        BRANCH_COST insns.
        (find_if_case_2): Same.

From-SVN: r84233

files.patch:

+	(find_if_case_2): Same.
